io.vertx.ext.shell.system

Interface Process


  • public interface Process
    A process managed by the shell.
    Author:
    Julien Viet

      • status

        ExecStatus status()
        Returns:
        the current process status

      • exitCode

        Integer exitCode()
        Returns:
        the process exit code when the status is ExecStatus.TERMINATED otherwise null
